languages.text: Внутри ящика по кромке тянется вереница выцарапанных букв — разные имена, но одна и та же фамилия. Похоже, этот ящик передается в семье из поколения в поколение.

Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.
languages.original_text: Внутри ящика по кромке тянется вереница выцарапанных букв — разные имена, но одна и та же фамилия. Похоже, этот ящик передается в семье из поколения в поколение.

traits.locale_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

languages.text: 一串字母刻在了盒子内部边缘处。那些名字各自不同，但都是同样的姓氏。看来，这个盒子在这个家族代代相传。
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: 一串字母刻在了盒子内部边缘处。那些名字各自不同，但都是同样的姓氏。看来，这个盒子在这个家族代代相传。

languages.text: Dentro de la caja hay una serie de letras tachadas en el borde. Los nombres cambian pero el apellido es el mismo. Parece que la caja se ha transmitido de generación en generación.
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: Dentro de la caja hay una serie de letras tachadas en el borde. Los nombres cambian pero el apellido es el mismo. Parece que la caja se ha transmitido de generación en generación.

languages.text: 箱の中には、名前は違えど同じ苗字のひっかいて刻まれた文字が縁に沿って並んでいる。この箱は代々家族に受け継がれてきたようだ。
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: 箱の中には、名前は違えど同じ苗字のひっかいて刻まれた文字が縁に沿って並んでいる。この箱は代々家族に受け継がれてきたようだ。

languages.text: Im Inneren der Kiste verläuft am Rand eine Folge eingekratzter Buchstaben — unterschiedliche Vornamen, aber derselbe Nachname. Die Kiste wurde offenbar innerhalb einer Familie von Generation zu Generation weitervererbt.
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: Im Inneren der Kiste verläuft am Rand eine Folge eingekratzter Buchstaben — unterschiedliche Vornamen, aber derselbe Nachname. Die Kiste wurde offenbar innerhalb einer Familie von Generation zu Generation weitervererbt.

languages.text: Une série de noms a été griffonnée sur les parois internes du coffret. Seul le prénom change ; le patronyme, lui, reste toujours le même. Manifestement, il s'est transmis de génération en génération au sein de la famille.
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: Une série de noms a été griffonnée sur les parois internes du coffret. Seul le prénom change ; le patronyme, lui, reste toujours le même. Manifestement, il s'est transmis de génération en génération au sein de la famille.

languages.text: Kutunun içinde karalanmış bir dizi mektup duruyor. Üstlerindeki isimler farklı olsa da soy isimler aynı. Görünüşe göre kutu, hane içinde nesilden nesle aktarılmış.
languages.original_text: Inside the box, a string of scratched letters runs along the edge — different first names but the same surname. It looks like this box has been passed down in the family from generation to generation.

traits.locale_text: Kutunun içinde karalanmış bir dizi mektup duruyor. Üstlerindeki isimler farklı olsa da soy isimler aynı. Görünüşe göre kutu, hane içinde nesilden nesile aktarılmış.
